projects.title: INTERNSHIP PORTAL
projects.description: A website which registers colleges and students looking for internships Used JWT for authentication and authorization, AWS S3 service forstoring files

projects.title: BOOK MANAGEMENT
projects.description: Developed backend of a website like BooksWagon where users can register, publish books and give ratings to each book

projects.title: SHOPPING CARD
projects.description: Developed backend of a shopping website using JWT for authentication & authorization. Used AWS S3 for storing images & Bcrypt for hashing passwords.

projects.title: URL SHORTNER
projects.description: Developed backend of a website like TinyURL which shortens a longURL using shortId npm package.Used Redis for caching urls to improve performance
